project_description: A comprehensive Flutter application using the Cubit pattern for state management to manage a list of birds.
architecture_overview: The project follows a modular architecture focusing on separation of concerns. Each feature has its own module containing screens, cubits, models, and widgets. The Cubit pattern is used for state management, ensuring clear state transitions and efficient updates.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: The entry point of the Flutter application, setting up the app and providing necessary Cubits.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main entry point of the application.

files.name: lib/screens/home_screen.dart
files.description: The home screen of the application showing a list of birds.

files.name: lib/screens/bird_screen.dart
files.description: A screen showing details of a single bird.

files.name: lib/cubits/bird_cubit.dart
files.description: Cubit responsible for managing the state of birds.

files.name: lib/widgets/bird_list_widget.dart
files.description: Widget displaying a list of birds.

files.name: lib/widgets/bird_item_widget.dart
files.description: Widget displaying a single bird item.

widgets.name: HomeScreen
widgets.description: The home screen of the application showing a list of birds.

widgets.name: BirdScreen
widgets.description: A screen showing details of a single bird.

widgets.name: BirdListWidget
widgets.description: Widget displaying a list of birds.

widgets.name: BirdItemWidget
widgets.description: Widget displaying a single bird item.

cubits.name: BirdCubit
cubits.description: Cubit responsible for managing the state of birds.

dependencies.name: flutter
dependencies.purpose: Flutter framework for building mobile applications.

dependencies.name: flutter_bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management library for Flutter applications using the BLoC pattern.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> HomeScreen: open app
HomeScreen -> BirdCubit: loadBirds()
BirdCubit -> BirdState: emit BirdLoadedState
HomeScreen -> BirdListWidget: build
BirdListWidget -> BirdItemWidget: build each item
@enduml
state_management_flow: State is managed using Cubit from the flutter_bloc package. BirdCubit is responsible for managing the bird state. It emits different states like BirdLoadingState, BirdLoadedState, and BirdErrorState based on the actions performed.
navigation_flow: The app uses a basic navigation structure with routes defined for HomeScreen and BirdScreen. Users start at HomeScreen and can navigate to BirdScreen to view details about a specific bird.

pubspec_yaml.name: bird_app
pubspec_yaml.description: A Flutter application to manage birds using the Cubit pattern for state management.
